text: “Ia bar men asebar marvir guabar apongtɨ da isigh. Egh men silva ko golɨn me uan asebar marvir guabar kurtibagh ifongan markɨ. Ikiavɨra Itir God, ian God, a bar aser kabar marvir guabar aghua. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia bizir kaba inian markɨ. Ia da inightɨ da ti azuazimɨn mɨn, ian suightɨ ia arɨmɨghiregham.
